dtliExcerpt: This revival of the 1944 Bernstein-Comden-Green musical about three sailors on shore leave in New York is both faithful to the original and thrillingly contemporary.
bwwExcerpt: On the Town is a heartbreakingly youthful work: both about youth and by youth. Watching its three sailors pursue a lifetime of adventure while on 24-hour shore leave in New York, New York, you can't help sensing the shadows of the three giddy pals who knocked the show together in 1944...And yet here...
